AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.federal prison: place where Federico Saldana served at least 9 years
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: The court where Federico Saldana's hearing was held
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: place where trailer's license plate was issued and residence of Federico Saldana, also a point of origin for a trip to Dallas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: place where truck's license plate was registered
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo checkpoint: checkpoint where Federico Saldana was found transporting drugs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas: ultimate destination of Federico Saldana's trip for repairs
